0.cdata!:
Republique du Cap Vert - Project
            d'Appui au Secteur Routier

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Road Sector Support
            Project is to improve, by widening, the present cobblestone
            road from Eito, then establish a bridge where it presently
            enters the river bed. The negative impacts of the project
            are as follows: acquisition of land, loss of agricultural
            land, affect on livelihood, displacement of people, cutting
            of trees, and loss of other assets. The mitigation measures
            of the project are as follows: (i) Paul Municipality will
            give the owner 200
